original: skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa'i brgyud 'debs bsdus pa byin rlabs dpal skyed ces bya ba dge /
analyzed: skyob gro yan lag drug ba brgyud debs sdud ba byin rlabs dpal skyed ces byed ba dge

original: ston mchog sh+aakya seng+ge-spyan ras gzigs //
analyzed: ston mchog sh+aakya seng+ge-spyan ras gzigs

original: pan chen bi ma dz+ny+aa na ku m+aa ra //
analyzed: pan chen bi ma dz+ny+aa na ku m+aa ra

original: so zur gnubs gsum kun mkhyen rong klong zung //
analyzed: so zur gnubs gsum kun mkhyen rong klong zung

original: gter bdag gling pa lo chen chos dpal nas //
analyzed: gter bdag gling ba lo chen chos dpal nas

original: rtsa ba'i bla ma'i bar byon skyabs 'gro'i gzhung //
analyzed: rtsa ba bla ma ba byon skyob gro gzhung

original: yan lag drug pa'i chos kyi mnga' bdag la //
analyzed: yan lag drug ba chos kyi mnga bdag la

original: gsol ba 'debs so thos bsam sgom sgrub kyis //
analyzed: gsol ba debs so thos bsam sgom sgrub kyis

original: rang rgyud smin grol 'chad rtsod rtsom pa yis //
analyzed: rang brgyud smin grol chad rtsod rtsom ba yis

original: gzhan phan byed stobs thub bstan ji srid bar //
analyzed: gzhan phan byed stobs thub ston ji srid ba

original: 'dzam gling mdzes pa'i rgyan du 'phel rgyas shog /
analyzed: dzam gling mdzes ba rgyan du phel rgya shog

original: chos grwa chen po o rgyan smin grol gling du dpal gyi seng+ges gsol ba btab pa'o //
